  • Who uses CanJS?
  • / On this page

      • Who uses CanJS?

      page
      • source

      Apple Store

      Discovered via Reddit

      http://www.apple.com/shop/buy-iphone/iphone-7

      Chase

      http://payments.chase.com

      HP

      http://store.hp.com

      USGA

      http://www.usga.org

      Yahoo

      Yahoo uses CanJS in its Brightroll Console, a tool used to purchase ads and explore analytics.

      PlutoTV

      http://pluto.tv/watch

      FedEx

      FedEx uses CanJS in its package tracker.

      https://www.fedex.com/apps/fedextrack

      Sam’s Club

      https://m.samsclub.com

      Delta SkyMiles

      Delta uses CanJS in its rewards program, SkyMiles.

      http://www.skymilesshopping.com

      Fidelity

      Fidelity uses JavaScriptMVC (the previous name for CanJS) in its Mutual Fund comparison tool.

      https://www.fidelity.com/fund-screener/research.shtml

      Cars.com

      http://www.cars.com

      Submit other apps

      Did you work on an app that uses CanJS? Please add it to the list here and create a PR, or email it here and we’d be happy to submit it for you!

      CanJS is part of DoneJS. Created and maintained by the core DoneJS team and Bitovi. Currently 3.2.2.
